irl.irgw
Class IRGW

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--irl.irgw.IRGW
public class IRGW
extends java.lang.Object

A class used to create the irgw associated to the server. With the RequestLogger, this class implements the IRGW component of IRL infrastructure.

In order to replicate a service through IRL, a programmer must explicitly use the class IRGW.

 import irl.irgw.IRGW;
 //.....
 
 public class Server
 {
     org.omg.CORBA.ORB.orb = org.omg.CORBA.ORB.init(args, props);
     org.omg.Portableserver.POA poa = 
         IRGW.resolve_root_poa(orb);
     //..................
     //..................
     org.omg.CORBA.Object o = IRGW.servant_to_reference(servant);
     //..................
 }

See Also:
RequestLogger

CORBA

public static final int CORBA
Define the protocol for the standard corba invocation.

With this protocol the log .............

IRL

public static final int IRL
Define the protocol for corba invocation to replicated servers, that run on the IRL infrastructure.

This protocol add some special parameters used for logging. The paramaters are the FTRequestServiceContext and other specific multicast protocol parameter.

The protocol for the logging.
